author: Haris Kruskic
title: Chatri Sityodtong on What's Next for ONE Championship During COVID-19 Outbreak
description: CEOs like Chatri Sityodtong of ONE Championship, one of the largest martial arts promotions in the world, have their hands full trying to steer the sports industry back on its tracks during the COVID-19 outbreak...
content:
ONE Championship
CEOs like Chatri Sityodtong of ONE Championship, one of the largest martial arts promotions in the world, have their hands full trying to steer the sports industry back on its tracks during the COVID-19 outbreak. Singapore-based ONE was amon… [+7827 chars]
